mod_plot module#

mod_plot.create_movie(ds_passes, var_type='ssh', name_denoised='ssha_denoised_unet', method='SWOT', region_info=None, time0=numpy.datetime64, ndays=38, dir_output='../figures/', dim_name=['time', 'latitude', 'longitude'], orbit='1d', framerate=3, Display=True, newmovie=False, diff=False)#
mod_plot.create_movie_old(ds_passes, name_var='ssha', method='SWOT', region='GS', lonlat_minmax=[309, 314, 30, 42], time0=numpy.datetime64, ndays=38, dir_output='../figures/', dim_name=['time', 'latitude', 'longitude'], framerate=3, Display=True, clim=[-0.6, 0.6], cmap='Spectral', newmovie=False)#
mod_plot.movie_intercomp(ds_passes, methods=['DUACS'], var_type='uv', name_var=['uv'], date=numpy.datetime64, dir_output='../results/', region='Agulhas', vmax=None, framerate=24, colsize=14, suffix='v02')#
mod_plot.plot_compare_snapshots(ds_SWOT, methods=['Noisy'], var_type='ssh', name_var=['ssha_new_editing'], date_plot=numpy.datetime64, region_info=None, method='Unet_baseline', orbit='1d', vmax=None, dir_output='../figures/', savefig=True, colsize=14, fig=None, diff=False)#
